sqlMap.select: select * from ( select p.p_id, p.p_name, p.p_price, p.p_img, p.p_detail, p.p_date, p.m_id, p.ct_id, p.p_status, ROWNUM RS from ( select * from category where ct_small = #category# or ct_large = #category# ) ct join product p on p.ct_id = ct.ct_id ) where RS BETWEEN #startPage# AND #endPage#

select * from ( select p.p_id, p.p_name, p.p_price, p.p_img, p.p_detail, p.p_date, p.m_id, p.ct_id, p.p_status, ROWNUM RS from ( select * from category where ct_small = #category# or ct_large = #category# ) ct join product p on p.ct_id = ct.ct_id where p_name like '%' || #searchtext# || '%' ) where RS BETWEEN #startPage# AND #endPage#
select * from category where ct_large = #category# or ct_small = #category#
